title: a film with Will Smith in the lead role as the former Heavyweight champ, Muhammad Ali
review: Why would you make a movie about arguably the greatest boxer of all time and only include about ten minutes of on-screen boxing altogether? Who decided that the blood feud between Ali and Joe Frazier was not worthy of more that a fleeting glimpse of Frazier and his huge left hook that dropped Ali in the 11th of their first fight?
